description: The Axiom Space Ax-4 mission concluded as SpaceX’s Dragon capsule Grace brought four astronauts back to Earth after more than 2.5 weeks on the ISS. Commanded by Peggy Whitson, the crew conducted 60 experiments. The capsule safely splashes down in the Pacific Ocean, marking SpaceX’s second West Coast crew recovery.
title: Axiom Space’s Ax-4 Crew Returns from ISS Aboard SpaceX Dragon Grace After Record Research Mission

description: A groundbreaking study from University College London and the University of Cambridge reveals that water ice in space, long believed to be completely amorphous due to extreme cold, may actually contain up to 25% crystalline structure. Simulations and X-ray diffraction experiments confirm the presence of nanocrystals in so-called low-density amorphous ice. This surprising finding has significant implications for our understanding of planetary formation, galactic evolution, and how life’s essential ingredients may have traveled to Earth on interstellar ice grains.
title: Crystalline Ice Discovered in Space: New Study Reveals Hidden Order in Cosmic Ice

description: In response to severe flooding near Kerrville, Texas, NASA deployed two aircraft equipped with DyNAMITE and UAVSAR sensors. These tools deliver real-time, high-resolution imagery and radar data to aid FEMA and local authorities in search, rescue, and recovery operations.
title: NASA Deploys High-Tech Aircraft to Support Texas Flood Relief and Recovery Efforts

description: Directed by Kahlid Rahman, Anuraga Karikkim Vellam is a romantic comedy that revolves around a father and son duo who deal with their impacted relationship, and get trapped within the exchange of wrong numbers. This movie is a complete entertainer. Streaming now, only on SunNXT.
title: Anuraga Karikkim Vellam Streaming Now on SunNXT: Everything To Know About Cast, Plot, and More

description: NASA’s DART mission successfully deflected an asteroid but also unleashed high-velocity boulders with unexpected momentum. These chaotic ejecta may alter asteroid spin and orbit, complicating future deflection strategies. A new study highlights the importance of accounting for such forces in planetary defence. ESA’s Hera mission will further investigate the aftermath when it reaches Dimorphos in 2026.
title: Massive Boulders Ejected by DART Mission Could Complicate Future Asteroid Deflection

description: Romantic adventure drama The Map That Leads to You, starring Madelyn Cline and K.J. Apa, releases on Amazon Prime Video on August 20, 2025. Set across Europe, the film blends romance, travel, and mystery. Check out its official trailer, cast, plot synopsis, and social media buzz.
title: The Map That Leads to You OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: CyberPowerPC has launched an esports masterclass series in Navi Mumbai, aimed at gamers and parents. It is designed to spread awareness of the structure, opportunities, and challenges within India's growing esports sector. These esports masterclass sessions feature industry experts and top players, addressing career paths, balancing academics, and the importance of parental support, as esports continues to grow in importance in India.
title: CyberPowerPC India Announces Launch of Esports Masterclass Series in Navi Mumbai

description: The iPhone 16 is currently available at Rs. 69,999 on Flipkart for its 128GB option, which is Rs. 9,901 less than its launch price. Shoppers can get the phone for an even cheaper rate with additional bank offers worth Rs. 3,000 during the ongoing Flipkart GOAT Sale 2025. On Amazon, the same variant is listed at Rs. 73,500 with other additional benefits. The handset also comes in 256GB and 512GB variants, and in five colour options.
title: iPhone 16 Available at Rs 69,999 in Flipkart's GOAT Sale 2025; Price Discounted on Amazon as Well

description: The Delhi High Court granted an ad-interim injunction to Reliance Industries, restraining 21 defendants from using its 'Reliance' and 'Jio' trademarks for FMCG products. The Court noted the defendants’ packaging mirrored Reliance's branding, risking consumer deception. E-commerce platforms have been directed to delist infringing listings and disclose details of these sellers.
title: Delhi High Court Orders E-Commerce Platforms to Delist Products Infringing on Reliance, Jio Trademarks

description: Gemini in Gmail is vulnerable to prompt injection-based phishing attacks, a researcher demonstrated. As per the researcher, the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot that offers features such as email summary generation and email rewriting can be manipulated into displaying phishing messages to users. This vulnerability poses a significant risk, as attackers could potentially exploit it to conduct online scams.
title: Gemini in Gmail Vulnerable to Prompt Injection-Based Phishing Attacks, Researcher Finds

description: Pixel Watch 4 will reportedly not offer an upgrade in terms of the SoC. Google is said to use the Snapdragon W5 Gen 1 in the upcoming wearable. This would be the third consecutive year the company will pack the same chipset in its Pixel Watch lineup. The upcoming model is said to be available in 41mm and 45mm size options.
title: Google Pixel Watch 4 Could Use Same Processor as Last Year's Pixel Watch 3

description: The Portronics Beem 540 is a smart LED projector with 4,000 lumens of brightness, capable of projecting up to 100 inches. It supports 4K content playback and runs on Android 13. It comes with pre-installed OTT apps like Netflix, Prime Video, and YouTube. Other key features include a telescopic stand, an LED lamp, auto-focus, vertical auto keystone correction, and a dual-turbo cooling system. It offers Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, HDMI, USB, and AUX connectivity, and includes an inbuilt 3W speaker with external audio support.
title: Portronics Beem 540 Smart LED Projector Launched in India WIth 4,000 Lumens Brightness: Price, Specifications

description: The Realme C71 4G, starting at Rs. 7,699, features a 6.74-inch HD+ display with a 90Hz refresh rate and 563 nits brightness. It is powered by a Unisoc T7250 SoC, with up to 6GB RAM and up to 128GB storage, and runs Android 15-based Realme UI 6. It offers a 13-megapixel rear and 5-megapixel front cameras, alongside features like AI Eraser and dual-view video. The phone has a 6,300mAh battery with 15W fast and 6W reverse charging, an IP54-rated build and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.
title: Realme C71 Launched in India With 6,300mAh Battery, Reverse Charging Support

description: Samsung Galaxy F36 5G India launch date announced. It is shown in three colour options with a triple rear camera unit. It will be available for purchase through Flipkart. It is rumoured to run on the Exynos 1380 chipset, coupled with 6GB of RAM.
title: Samsung Galaxy F36 5G Confirmed to Launch in India This Week; Rear Design Teased

description: Google’s Pixel phones might get a new Gemini Space feature as it has been spotted on the latest Canary developer build of Android. The feature, said to be an upgrade 'At a Glance', will reportedly show users sports cards and birthdays of contacts on the lock screen, home screen, and the always-on display. However, it is unclear when Google will make the feature available to all Pixel users.
title: Google’s Gemini Space Feature With Sports, Birthday Reminder Cards Spotted: Report

description: Grok for Government, a new initiative by Elon Musk-owned xAI, was announced on Monday. The initiative will build “frontier artificial intelligence (AI) products” for the US government agencies and create agentic workflows for them. The AI firm also won a contract with a ceiling of $200 million (roughly Rs. 1,716 crores) from the US Department of Defense to develop AI capabilities.
title: Grok for Government Announced as Elon Musk’s xAI Wins $200 Million US Defense Department Contract

description: The HMD T21 Tablet features a 10.36-inch 2K display with SGS low blue light certification and is powered by a Unisoc T612 SoC. It includes 8-megapixel front and rear cameras and dual stereo speakers with OZO Audio support. The tablet also supports an Active Pen and can be used as a second PC screen. It packs an 8,200mAh battery with 18W charging, dual SIM 4G support, and an IP52-rated build.
title: HMD T21 Tablet Launched in India With 10.36-Inch 2K Display, 8,200mAh Battery

description: Mark Gurman has suggested a launch timeline for the new iPhone 17 models in the latest edition of his Power On newsletter. The lineup comprising iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max is expected to be launched in the second week of September.
title: iPhone 17 Lineup to Launch in the Second Week of September: Report

description: Facebook says it will crack down on unoriginal content. According to Meta, the reach of accounts that improperly reuse content will be lowered and access to monetisation tools will be limited. Original videos might also get more views, as the distribution of duplicate copies will be restricted. Meta's changes to its policy were announced after YouTube announced it was taking action against repetitive and mass-produced videos shared on the platform.
title: Meta Introduces Stringent Measures Against Unoriginal, Improperly Reused Facebook Content

description: Motorola’s Razr 60 Ultra may look very familiar on the outside, but a lot has changed for the better on the inside. Its design’s IP-rating gets bumped up to resist both dust and water. There are new finishes and colourways to pick from as well. For once, there’s an “ultra-grade” processor, new cameras, and a fresh-new Moto AI to keep up with the times. But do all of these additions make it a better phone overall?
title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra Review: Flip Phone Perfection?

description: Vivo T4R 5G will launch in India soon, a banner ad on an e-commerce platform confirmed. In the ad, the company claims that the upcoming smartphone would be India’s slimmest phone with a quad curved display. It will measure 7.39mm in thickness. As per a report, the phone was recently tipped to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity SoC. Additionally, the phone’s price details were also leaked online recently.
title: Vivo T4R 5G Confirmed to Launch in India Soon; Design Teased

description: Google’s NotebookLM is getting a new feature to help users learn about new topics without having to look for high-quality sources. Announced on Monday, the new addition is dubbed featured notebooks, and these are a list of sources curated by domain experts that users can directly open as a new notebook.
title: Google NotebookLM Gets Featured Notebooks, Offers Expert-Curated Sources for Users

description: Samsung released its Android 16-based One UI 8 operating system (OS) at Galaxy Unpacked 2025 earlier this month. While only the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE run on the OS out-of-the-box, a tipster suggests that internal testing of the firmware for two older Galaxy devices has begun. Internal test builds of the firmware are said to have been spotted on the server for the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 and the Galaxy Z Flip 4.
title: Samsung Said to Have Begun Testing One UI 8 on Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Galaxy Z Flip 4

description: Anthropic is now expanding the list of apps and platforms its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot can connect to. In May, the AI firm introduced Integrations, a new feature that made use of the company’s Model Context Protocol (MCP) to connect to remote servers across the web and desktop apps. On Monday, the AI firm added a directory of tools that connect to Claude, as well as new third-party connectors.
title: Anthropic’s Claude Can Now Connect With Notion, Canva and Figma to Complete Tasks

description: International Data Corporation (IDC) has released its Worldwide Quarterly Mobile Phone Tracker report. As per the report, the global smartphone market has grown by 1 percent in Q2 2025 from the same quarter last year. The report shows that Samsung and Vivo saw the biggest YoY increase in global smartphone shipments, 7.9 and 4.8 percent respectively.
title: Global Smartphone Market Grew 1 Percent YoY in Q2 2025; Samsung, Vivo Witness Biggest Jump in Shipments: IDC

description: iQOO has revealed when the iQOO Z10R will be launched in India. The Vivo sub-brand, through its social media handle, announced the launch date of the new Neo smartphone on Tuesday. It will go on sale via Amazon. It is already confirmed to ship with a 32-megapixel selfie camera.
title: iQOO Z10R Confirmed to Launch in India on July 24 With 32-Megapixel Selfie Camera

description: LG has launched its 2025 lineup of OLED Evo and QNLED Evo TVs in India. The new models are powered by the Alpha AI Processor Gen2 which brings several AI-backed features, including AI Concierge, AI Picture Wizard, and AI Welcome. The LG OLED Evo TVs are equipped with a Brightness Booster Ultimate ultimate feature which improves the light control architecture. Meanwhile, the LG QNED Evo TVs combine Mini LED technology with Dynamic QNED Colour processing for more accurate colour reproduction.
title: LG OLED evo and QNED evo TVs With Alpha AI Processor Gen2 Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: After partnering with Swarovski for its recently announced Moto Buds Loop, it now seems that Motorola is preparing to announce a smartphone in collaboration with the same brand. With the Motorola Razr 60 Ultra and Razr 60 recently announced, there is a new Razr 60 (or Razr 2025) Swarovski Edition reportedly on the way. Leaked images of the phone showcase a unique design.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Swarovski Edition With Crystal-Studded Design Said to Launch Soon

description: The Realme C71 5G, starting at Rs. 7,699, features a 6.74-inch HD+ display with a 90Hz refresh rate and 563 nits brightness. It is powered by a Unisoc T7250 SoC, with up to 6GB RAM and up to 128GB storage, and runs Android 15-based Realme UI 6. It offers a 13-megapixel rear and 5-megapixel front cameras, alongside features like AI Eraser and dual-view video. The phone has a 6,300mAh battery with 15W fast and 6W reverse charging, an IP54-rated build and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.
title: Realme C71 5G Launched in India With 6,300mAh Battery, Reverse Charging Support

description: The Tecno Pova Curve 5G recently made its debut in India. The smartphone promises a 144Hz screen, good performance, AI features, and a long battery life — all under Rs. 20,000. But do these on-paper upgrades translate into an equivalent real-world experience? Find out in our Tecno Pova Curve 5G review.
title: Tecno Pova Curve 5G Review: Stylish Looks With Just Enough Bite

description: WhatsApp is introducing a new official support chat on iOS, offering AI-powered responses directly within the platform. This dedicated in-app channel could make it easier to get help when encountering service issues. Users might also have the option to connect with human WhatsApp support staff within the same chat.
title: WhatsApp Adds Dedicated Support Chat With AI-Powered Responses on iOS

description: Chinese smartphone makers are said to be testing under-display 3D facial recognition technology. This could allow the brand to provide a secure face unlock feature in its upcoming phones without visible camera cutouts. The 3D Face recongnition feature is currently available on some Android phones from Honor and ZTE.
title: Chinese Android Phone Brands Said to Be Testing Under-Display Cameras and 3D Face Unlock

description: Elon Musk-owned xAI released a new feature for Grok’s most premium subscribers on Monday. Dubbed Companions, these are animated characters that react to user prompts, can move their head and body, and display facial expressions when responding. The new artificial intelligence (AI) feature is currently only available on the iOS app.
title: Elon Musk’s Grok Adds AI Companion Feature That Includes an NSFW Mode for Animated Avatars

description: The Realme 15 Pro 5G will feature a triple rear camera setup with a 50-megapixel Sony IMX896 main sensor with OIS and 4K 60fps video support. It will support features like AI MagicGlow 2.0, AI Party Mode, and AI Edit Genie with voice control. The phone will have a 4D curved 144Hz display with 6,500 nits brightness and Gorilla Glass protection. It will be powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC.
title: Realme 15 Pro 5G to Get 50-Megapixel Sony IMX896 Main Rear Camera

description: Apple iPhone 17 series components have been imported by a contract manufacturer in India, according to a report. This suggests trial production for the iPhone 17 lineup might commence this month, with mass production potentially starting next month. Apple's manufacturing presence in India has steadily grown since the iPhone SE, and the company has been ramping up production to meet demand in the US and tackle China tariff worries.
title: iPhone 17 Components Arrive in India; Mass Production Expected to Begin in August: Report

description: Oppo recently confirmed that it is going to launch its new K-series smartphones in China on July 21. The series is confirmed to feature at least two handsets - K13 Turbo and K13 Turbo Pro. From the promo posts shared by the company on a Chinese social media platform, it looks like the handsets are primarily going to target gamers as it will come with a turbo cooling fan at the back.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo, K13 Turbo Pro Design, Colour Options Revealed Ahead of July 21 Launch

description: Elon Musk’s Tesla has officially entered India’s electric vehicle (EV) market with the launch of the Tesla Model Y and opening of the Experience Centre in Mumbai. The Tesla Model Y is the first EV that will be sold by the US-based automotive company in the country, with on-road prices starting at Rs. 61 lakh. Alongside, the Tessie app has also been made available on the App Store for iOS.
title: Tesla Model Y Price in India Announced; Tesla App for iOS Available to Download

description: The Vivo Y50 5G and Y50m 5G have been spotted on the China Telecom website. They feature similar designs with rectangular rear camera modules, flat 6.74-inch HD+ displays, and carry MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipsets, according to the listings. Both run Android 15, pack 6,000mAh batteries, and offer 13-megapixel rear and 5-megapixel front cameras. They support dual SIM, Wi-Fi, USB Type-C connectivity, and include a 3.5mm jack.
title: Vivo Y50 5G, Vivo Y50m 5G Appear on China Telecom Site With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold's key specifications have leaked on the Web. It is said to feature a 5,015mAh battery, Tensor G5 SoC, and 16GB of RAM. It is tipped to come in 256GB, 512GB and 1TB of storage options with an IP68-rated build. It is likely to have the same cameras as its predecessor. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold could offer a larger cover display.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Said to Get Larger Battery, Faster Charging and Bigger Cover Display
How to Recharge and Update Your Airtel Payments Bank’s RuPay On-The-Go Card Balance

description: The Nothing Phone 3 was launched in India alongside the Headphone 1, on July 1. According to the UK-based brand, the handset and the over-the-ear headphones are set to be available for purchase starting today (July 15). The Nothing Phone 3 is powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset and features a new Glyph Matrix design element at the back which replaces the signature Glyph Interface. Meanwhile, the Nothing Headphone 1 carries ANC and 40mm dynamic drivers.
title: Nothing Phone 3 and Headphone 1 Sale in India Begins Today: Price, Offers

description: OnePlus on Monday announced a new update for its flagship smartphones, the OnePlus 13 series. It adds a new feature called Plus Mind which the China-based company introduced with the OnePlus 13s in June. It is aimed at enabling users to quickly store content or information in a centralised hub with a few swipe gestures, and organise it for recalling later on. Further, Plus Mind can generate descriptions and sort out information with tags.
title: OnePlus 13 Series Update Brings Plus Mind Feature for Quickly Storing Information in Mind Space
